name: Qatar A350 Economy Class Review
description:
We know Qatar is excellent in business class - but what are they like in economy class?  On this review I give them the ultimate test - a 14 hour overnight flight from Adelaide to Doha.  

THIS IS A RE-UPLOAD OF VIDEO ORIGINALLY UPLOADED 2 DAYS AGO - END OF VIDEO HAS CHANGED TO NOW INCLUDE THE BRILLIANT QATAR CREW WHO MADE THIS SUCH A GREAT FLIGHT. 

This flight was on Qatar's new Airbus A350 aircraft - it's a beautiful plane and well worth checking out. 

This flight review covers boarding, take off, the economy class cabin, Qatar's economy class seat, the inflight meals and Qatar inflight entertainment system. 

Flight:     QR915
Route:    Adelaide to Doha - 14 hours
When:    January 2017
Aircraft:  Airbus A350-900   registration A7ALI
Seat:       41K
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP55

Upcoming reviews:

Qatar A350 Business Class
Qatar A320 Business Class
Rwandair 737 Economy Class

For other reviews including Qantas, Emirates, Etihad, Singapore Airlines, LATAM, Egypt Air, Turkish Airlines, Malaysia Airlines, Cathay Pacific and Air Baltic visit my channel DennisBunnik Travels

This video may not be reproduced without express permission.
